name: Pound
text: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

name: Karate Chop
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Double Slap
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Comet Punch
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Mega Punch
text: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

name: Pay Day
text: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

name: Fire Punch
text: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Ice Punch

name: Thunder Punch
text: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Scratch

text: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Razor Wind
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Swords Dance
text: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.

name: Cut

name: Gust

text: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

name: Whirlwind
text: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Fly
text: The user flies up into the sky and then strikes its target on the next turn.

name: Bind
text: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

name: Slam
text: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

name: Vine Whip
text: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

name: Stomp
text: The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Double Kick
text: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

name: Mega Kick
text: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

name: Jump Kick
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Rolling Kick
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Sand Attack
text: Sand is hurled in the target’s face, reducing the target’s accuracy.

name: Headbutt
text: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Horn Attack
text: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

name: Fury Attack
text: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

name: Horn Drill
text: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Tackle

name: Body Slam
text: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Wrap
text: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

name: Take Down
text: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

name: Thrash
text: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Double-Edge

name: Tail Whip
text: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stats.

name: Poison Sting

name: Twineedle
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Pin Missile
text: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

name: Leer
text: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers the Defense stat.

name: Bite

name: Growl
text: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.

name: Roar

name: Sing
text: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

name: Supersonic
text: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

name: Sonic Boom
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Disable
text: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

name: Acid
text: Opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.

name: Ember

name: Flamethrower

name: Mist

name: Water Gun

name: Hydro Pump

name: Surf
text: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

name: Ice Beam
text: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Blizzard

name: Psybeam
text: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.

name: Bubble Beam

name: Aurora Beam
text: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

name: Hyper Beam

name: Peck

name: Drill Peck

name: Submission

name: Low Kick

name: Counter
text: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

name: Seismic Toss
text: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

name: Strength

name: Absorb

name: Mega Drain
text: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Leech Seed

name: Growth
text: The user’s body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Razor Leaf

name: Solar Beam

name: Poison Powder
text: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

name: Stun Spore
text: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

name: Sleep Powder

name: Petal Dance
text: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: String Shot
text: Opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user’s mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.

name: Dragon Rage
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Fire Spin
text: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

name: Thunder Shock
text: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunderbolt
text: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Thunder Wave
text: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

name: Thunder
text: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Rock Throw
text: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

name: Earthquake
text: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

name: Fissure
text: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: Dig
text: The user burrows into the ground, then attacks on the next turn.

name: Toxic
text: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

name: Confusion

name: Psychic

name: Hypnosis
text: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

name: Meditate
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Agility
text: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

name: Quick Attack
text: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

name: Rage
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Teleport
text: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.

name: Night Shade
text: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

name: Mimic

name: Screech
text: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: Double Team

name: Recover
text: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

name: Harden

name: Minimize
text: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

name: Smokescreen

name: Confuse Ray

name: Withdraw

name: Defense Curl

name: Barrier
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Light Screen
text: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.

name: Haze

name: Reflect
text: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.

name: Focus Energy
text: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

name: Bide
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Metronome
text: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

name: Mirror Move
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Self-Destruct
text: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

name: Egg Bomb
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Lick

name: Smog
text: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.

name: Sludge
text: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

name: Bone Club
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Fire Blast
text: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Waterfall
text: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

name: Clamp
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Swift
text: Star-shaped rays are shot at opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

name: Skull Bash
text: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.

name: Spike Cannon
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Constrict
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Amnesia
text: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Kinesis
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Soft-Boiled
text: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: High Jump Kick
text: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

name: Glare
text: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

name: Dream Eater
text: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Poison Gas
text: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon, poisoning those it hits.

name: Barrage
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Leech Life
text: The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Lovely Kiss
text: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

name: Sky Attack
text: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Transform
text: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

name: Bubble
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Dizzy Punch
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Spore
text: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

name: Flash
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Psywave
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Splash
text: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

name: Acid Armor
text: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

name: Crabhammer
text: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Explosion
text: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

name: Fury Swipes
text: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes quickly two to five times in a row.

name: Bonemerang

name: Rest

name: Rock Slide
text: Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.

name: Hyper Fang
text: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Sharpen
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Conversion

name: Tri Attack
text: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

name: Super Fang
text: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.

name: Slash
text: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Substitute
text: The user creates a substitute for itself using some of its HP. The substitute serves as the user’s decoy.

name: Struggle
text: This attack is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also damages the user a little.

name: Sketch
text: It enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the target. Once used, Sketch disappears.

name: Triple Kick
text: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

name: Thief
text: The user attacks and steals the target’s held item simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it already holds an item.

name: Spider Web
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Mind Reader
text: The user senses the target’s movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the target.

name: Nightmare
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Flame Wheel
text: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Snore
text: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

name: Curse
text: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

name: Flail

name: Conversion 2
text: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the target used last.

name: Aeroblast
text: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Cotton Spore

name: Reversal

name: Spite

name: Powder Snow
text: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze opposing Pokémon.

name: Protect
text: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Mach Punch
text: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Scary Face
text: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

name: Feint Attack
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Sweet Kiss
text: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

name: Belly Drum
text: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

name: Sludge Bomb
text: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

name: Mud-Slap
text: The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

name: Octazooka
text: The user attacks by spraying ink in the target’s face or eyes. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: Spikes

name: Zap Cannon
text: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

name: Foresight
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Destiny Bond
text: After using this move, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Perish Song
text: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

name: Icy Wind
text: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers opposing Pokémon’s Speed stats.

name: Detect
text: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Bone Rush
text: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

name: Lock-On
text: The user takes sure aim at the target. This ensures the next attack does not miss the target.

name: Outrage
text: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Sandstorm
text: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except Rock, Ground, and Steel types. It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.

name: Giga Drain
text: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Endure
text: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Charm
text: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Rollout
text: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.

name: False Swipe
text: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: Swagger
text: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.

name: Milk Drink
text: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Spark
text: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Fury Cutter
text: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

name: Steel Wing
text: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat.

name: Mean Look
text: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

name: Attract
text: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

name: Sleep Talk
text: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

name: Heal Bell
text: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status conditions of all the party Pokémon.

name: Return
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Present
text: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. It restores HP sometimes, however.

name: Frustration
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Safeguard
text: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

name: Pain Split
text: The user adds its HP to the target’s HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the target.

name: Sacred Fire
text: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Magnitude
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Dynamic Punch
text: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.

name: Megahorn
text: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

name: Dragon Breath
text: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Baton Pass
text: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.

name: Encore
text: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

name: Pursuit
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Rapid Spin

name: Sweet Scent

name: Iron Tail

name: Metal Claw

name: Vital Throw
text: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move never misses.

name: Morning Sun
text: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Synthesis
text: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Moonlight
text: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Hidden Power
text: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

name: Cross Chop
text: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Twister
text: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

name: Rain Dance

name: Sunny Day

name: Crunch

name: Mirror Coat
text: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

name: Psych Up
text: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

name: Extreme Speed

name: Ancient Power
text: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

name: Shadow Ball

name: Future Sight

name: Rock Smash

name: Whirlpool

name: Uproar

name: Stockpile

name: Spit Up

name: Swallow

name: Heat Wave

name: Double Iron Bash
text: The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest, and then strikes with its arms twice in a row. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Max Guard
text: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Dynamax Cannon
text: The user unleashes a strong beam from its core. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: Snipe Shot
text: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

name: Jaw Lock
text: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.

name: Stuff Cheeks
text: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply raises its Defense stat.

name: No Retreat
text: This move raises all the user’s stats but prevents the user from switching out or fleeing.

name: Tar Shot
text: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target’s Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.

name: Magic Powder
text: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target to Psychic type.

name: Dragon Darts
text: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two targets, this move hits each target once.

name: Teatime
text: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

name: Octolock
text: The user locks the target in and prevents it from fleeing. This move also lowers the target’s Defense and Sp. Def every turn.

name: Bolt Beak
text: The user stabs the target with its electrified beak. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

name: Fishious Rend
text: The user rends the target with its hard gills. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

name: Court Change
text: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

name: Max Flare
text: This is a Fire-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user intensifies the sun for five turns.

name: Max Flutterby
text: This is a Bug-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Max Lightning
text: This is an Electric-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for five turns.

name: Max Strike
text: This is a Normal-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: Max Knuckle
text: This is a Fighting-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Attack stats.

name: Max Phantasm
text: This is a Ghost-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: Max Hailstorm
text: This is an Ice-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns.

name: Max Ooze
text: This is a Poison-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stats.

name: Max Geyser
text: This is a Water-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns.

name: Max Airstream
text: This is a Flying-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Speed stats.

name: Max Starfall
text: This is a Fairy-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Misty Terrain for five turns.

name: Max Wyrmwind
text: This is a Dragon-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Max Mindstorm
text: This is a Psychic-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Psychic Terrain for five turns.

name: Max Rockfall
text: This is a Rock-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a sandstorm lasting five turns.

name: Max Quake
text: This is a Ground-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Sp. Def stats.

name: Max Darkness
text: This is a Dark-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Max Overgrowth
text: This is a Grass-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns.

name: Max Steelspike
text: This is a Steel-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Defense stats.

name: Clangorous Soul
text: The user raises all its stats by using some of its HP.

name: Body Press
text: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user’s Defense, the more damage it can inflict on the target.

name: Decorate
text: The user sharply raises the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.

name: Drum Beating
text: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum’s roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: Snap Trap
text: The user snares the target in a snap trap for four to five turns.

name: Pyro Ball
text: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Behemoth Blade
text: The user becomes a gigantic sword and cuts the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: Behemoth Bash
text: The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: Aura Wheel
text: Morpeko attacks and raises its Speed with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move’s type changes depending on the user’s form.

name: Breaking Swipe
text: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

name: Branch Poke
text: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

name: Overdrive
text: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.

name: Apple Acid
text: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Grav Apple
text: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: Spirit Break
text: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target’s spirit. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Strange Steam
text: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may also confuse the target.

name: Life Dew
text: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon in the battle.

name: Obstruct
text: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession. Direct contact harshly lowers the attacker’s Defense stat.

name: False Surrender
text: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

name: Meteor Assault
text: The user attacks wildly with its thick leek. The user can’t move on the next turn, because the force of this move makes it stagger.

name: Eternabeam
text: This is Eternatus’s most powerful attack in its original form. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Steel Beam
text: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.
